name: 王明展
objective: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning. Topics discuss in class such as material handling, systematic layout planning, discrete layout problem, continuous layout problem, equal area layout problem, unequal area layout problem, heuristic method, storage system layout, and site selection are also included
schedule:
Week     Topic
 1~2    Introduction to Facilities Planning
  3     Location
 4~5    Systematic Layout Planning
  6     The Layout Problem-Qualitative
  7     Business Visiting
 8~9    The Layout Problem-Qualitative and The Layout Problem-
        Quantitative
 10     Midterm Examination
11~13   Unequal-Area Layout Problem and Equal-Area Layout Problem
 14     Computerized Layout Planning
 15     Optimization
16~17   Storage System Layout and Other Topics
 18     Final Examination
materials:
1. Facilities Planning Tompkins, Intermational Edition, White,
   Bozer, Tanchoco, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2003, 華泰文化代理。
2. Facility Layout and Location: An Analytical Approach, Francis,
   McGinnis, White, Prentice Hall, 華泰文化代理。
